turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I want to order three large pizzas with pepperoni thick crust from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, do you want just pepperoni for all 3?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, on just 1 of the pizzas or all 3?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, let me calculate the cost.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be $65 for 3 large pepperoni and green pepper pizzas with thick crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will this order be ready for pick up soon?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me check when it'll be ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, you can also choose to dine-in or have it delivered.
